Job Description: Job Description    We are looking for a PHP Developer responsible for managing back-end services and the interchange of data between the server and the users.Therefore, a basic understanding of front-end technologies is necessary as well.   Skills And Qualifications     Working Experience on any CMS (ex: Word Press ...)   MySQL profiling and query optimization.      Creative and efficient problem solver.   Develop, record and maintain cutting edge web-based PHP Code Igniter or Laravel.   Ensure HTML, CSS, and shared JavaScript is valid and consistent across applications.   Lead the entire web application development life cycle right from concept stage to delivery and post launch support.   Convey effectively with all task progress, evaluations, suggestions, schedules along with technical and process issues.
